title: 6 Degrees of Teemo Main
body:
Using the most recent [clairvoyance blog,](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/find-your-lunch-table-which-champs-are-friends#Teemo) I have compiled a list of how far each player is from maining the most hated champion of all: Teemo. Find your main on the list to see how far you are from becoming a Teemo main!

##0 Degrees:

* Teemo

##1 Degree:

* Annie
* Ashe
* Blitzcrank
* Dr. Mundo
* Fiddlesticks
* Garen
* Heimerdinger
* Jax
* Jinx
* Katarina
* Lux
* Malphite
* Master Yi
* Miss Fortune
* Nasus
* Nunu
* Rammus
* Singed
* Sona
* Tristana
* Tryndamere
* Veigar
* Warwick
* Xin Zhao
* Ziggs

##2 Degrees:

* Aatrox
* Ahri
* Akali
* Alistar
* Amumu
* Bard
* Brand
* Braum
* Caitlyn
* Cassiopeia
* Cho'Gath
* Corki
* Darius
* Diana
* Draven
* Ekko
* Evelynn
* Ezreal
* Fiora
* Fizz
* Galio
* Gragas
* Hecarim
* Janna
* Jarvan IV
* Jhin
* Kalista
* Karma
* Karthus
* Kayle
* Kog'Maw
* LeBlanc
* Lee Sin
* Leona
* Lissandra
* Lucian
* Lulu
* Malzahar
* Maokai
* Mordekaiser
* Morgana
* Nami
* Nautilus
* Nidalee
* Nocturne
* Olaf
* Orianna
* Pantheon
* Poppy
* Quinn
* Renekton
* Rengar
* Riven
* Rumble
* Ryze
* Sejuani
* Shaco
* Shen
* Shyvana
* Sion
* Sivir
* Skarner
* Soraka
* Syndra
* Tahm Kench
* Talon
* Taric
* Thresh
* Trundle
* Twitch
* Udyr
* Urgot
* Varus
* Vayne
* Viktor
* Vladimir
* Volibear
* Wukong
* Xerath
* Yasuo
* Yorick
* Zac
* Zed
* Zilean
* Zyra

##3 Degrees:

* Anivia
* Azir
* Elise
* Gangplank
* Gnar
* Graves
* Illaoi
* Irelia
* Jayce
* Kazzadin
* Kha'zix
* Kindred
* Rek'Sai
* Swain
* Twisted Fate
* Vel'Koz
* Vi

##4 Degrees:

* Kennen

##??? Degrees (Data were collected before their release):

* Aurelion Sol
* Taliyah

replies.body: Haha this is awesome {{champion:17}}
Kennen mains are the real heros
Kennen has only 1 correlation for some reason. Our only friend is gnar. I guess me playing both shyvana and kennen isn't enough to form a second one as they are my two mains :'(
They're also all secretly Naruto weebs... ~~jk~~

It's funny how it works out: Both Kennen and Gnar are my top 2 most played top laners.
I guess Riot really does know me well.
(STALKER)
Rito _DOES_ watch everything we do here.
I am 0 degrees from being a Teemo main. Bash me, sheeple! All downvote me and ride the hate bandwagon!
I'm so happy someone made this... true dedication
{{champion:90}} ... 2 Degrees. *already has Omega Squad {{champion:17}}*
2 degrees. I could get there with a little determination. I prefer to piss people off playing support though so nah.
You mean a point and click that causes the enemy adc to miss last hits isn't good for a support?

I guess you could say... this is one hell of a post.

~~I'm not sorry~~

i am 0 degrees from teemo.

no pain... no feeling... but hunger...

Hunger... for the tears of your enemies.
Now with 20% more salt.
I am a {{champion:161}} main so I'm pretty far from becoming a teem main
Hey ! Me too :D ! {{champion:161}} ftw
What's your Teemo-Bacon number?
Haha, now do one for Rumble (Pro-tip, you can't)
I played Teemo once, I felt so bad I logged off for the day.

that's funny... it seems you may misspelled a champion's name. I believe that Udyr is supposed to be spelled G-O-D-Y-R. At least, when I play him
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Hm...4 degrees for me. {{champion:85}} 

Though then again...I have over 150 k points on {{champion:17}}  atm. xD So evil; yet, so adorable.

Quick question:

WHY IS {{champion:202}} NOT AT 4 DEGREES
I just compiled the data. I didn't collect them.

2 degrees whichever champ I look at. I tend to main a role as opposed to a champ and support/tank is my current. Thresh, Braum, zac, cho'gath, nami, morgana are all 2 degrees. 

Also, I think shaco should be closer to teemo. Shaco has stealth and invisible traps w/ cc and damage. And I think quinn's blind puts her close to teemo.
This is based on data from the Clairvoiance blog about what champions people tend to play. For example, Nautilus mains tend to also play Braum.
2 is balanced; it only goes up to 4.
Oh geez, I don't know whether to be worried about being in the second degrees with Aatrox or no {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}}
Most champions are 2 degrees away. You're fine.
Used to be 0 when I was a young blooming summoner, now I'm 2 degree! It's only getting lighter my friend~
So wait... is this... a bad thing?
You'd think {{champion:201}} would be at the bottom of the list :o
good im not on list fore i am a poro with a mustache not a braum main
2nd degree Teemo, now if only I hadn't stopped maining Fiddlesticks.
There was a time when Vi was definitely 1 degree.

I'm Degree 2 through and through.

I mean it, all my champs are there.
well, 3 degrees, but http://imgur.com/0hDzDeI
One step away, Yissss (Sona)
I can proudly say I am three degrees from Teemo main
As an Azir main, I am a safe third degree. Thank god u scare me.
{{champion:30}} is 2 degrees? ...well He and Teemo were banned from OFA for a reason right?
